SELECT a.id, a.name accountName, a.serial_no serialNo, FORMAT(a.initial_amount, 2) initialAmount, FORMAT(a.current_amount, 2) currentAmount, a.remark, a.is_default isDefault, a.delete_flag deleteFlag, CONVERT (a.create_time, CHAR) createTime FROM erp_account a WHERE a.delete_flag = 0 AND a.tenant_id = #{userId}
AND a.name LIKE '%${accountName}%'
AND a.serial_no LIKE '%${serialNo}%'
AND a.remark LIKE '%${remark}%'
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
SELECT a.id FROM erp_account a WHERE a.delete_flag = 0 AND a.tenant_id = #{userId} AND a.name = #{accountName} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC LIMIT 0,1

SELECT a.id, a.name accountName, a.serial_no serialNo, a.initial_amount initialAmount, a.current_amount currentAmount, a.remark, a.is_default isDefault, CONVERT (a.create_time, CHAR) createTime FROM erp_account a WHERE a.delete_flag = 0 AND a.tenant_id = #{userId} AND a.id = #{id} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC LIMIT 0,1
SELECT a.id FROM erp_account a WHERE a.delete_flag = 0 AND a.is_default = 1 AND a.tenant_id = #{userId} AND a.id = #{id} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC LIMIT 0,1

SELECT a.id, a.name accountName, a.serial_no serialNo, FORMAT(a.initial_amount, 2) initialAmount, FORMAT(a.current_amount, 2) currentAmount, a.remark, a.is_default isDefault, CONVERT (a.create_time, CHAR) createTime FROM erp_account a WHERE a.delete_flag = 0 AND a.tenant_id = #{userId} AND a.id = #{id} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC LIMIT 0,1

SELECT d.id, d.type, d.sub_type subType, d.default_number defaultNumber, d.number, CONVERT (d.oper_time, CHAR) operTime, CONVERT (d.create_time, CHAR) createTime, FORMAT(d.total_price, 2) totalPrice, d.pay_type payType, d.remark, d.status FROM erp_depothead d WHERE d.account_id = #{id} AND d.tenant_id = #{userId} AND d.delete_flag = 0
SELECT a.id, a.`name` FROM erp_account a WHERE a.tenant_id = #{userId} AND a.delete_flag = '0' ORDER BY a.is_default ASC
SELECT SUM(d.total_price) totalPrice FROM erp_depothead d WHERE d.account_id = #{id} AND d.tenant_id = #{userId}
